title: Condensed sans face I.D
content:
Could someone help me identify these two condensed sans.

Thanks

comments.content: May be a [Helvetica Ultra Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020042201/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica/helvetica-ultra-compressed-1274/) for the HFRGcouv sample...

thanks!

Would anyone know anything sililar, with a bit more personality like the other example?
